page.title: 15Houses in Greyfriars(contd).
page.content: and Sandon Road.The Holmcroft area the council built houses in the late 1940's and at Tillington in the late 1950's. A privately built estate on the Stone Road at Tillington was begun in the later 1950's and was extended on both sides of Crab Lane to Eccleshall Road in the earlier 1960's.The private estate "Parkside"on the borough boundary east of the Stone Road was begun in the mid 1960's,and building continued into the 1970's.The M6 motorway access point on the Eccleshall Road at Creswell was opened in 1962.
